snippet: The regulations are the latest in a series of actions intended to cut back on greenhouse gases without the sort of legislation Mr. Obama failed to push through Congress in his first term.
abstract: Pres Obama orders development of tough new fuel efficiency standards for nation's fleet of heavy-duty trucks; aides say new regulations are part of what will be an increasingly muscular and unilateral campaign to tackle climate change through use of president's executive power.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and CORAL DAVENPORT
byline.contributor: Peter Baker reported from Upper Marlboro, Md., and Coral Davenport from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The regulations are the latest in a series of actions intended to cut back on greenhouse gases without the sort of legislation Mr. Obama failed to push through Congress in his first term.

headline.main: Obama Orders New Efficiency for Big Trucks
headline.print_headline: Obama Orders New Efficiency for Big Trucks
